title: Jai Bhim
plot: A tribal woman's husband vanishes after police custody. Someone seeks truth in a system built on silence.

title: Kaithi
plot: One night. One mission. A man races against time while carrying a burden that could save or destroy many.
Two souls meet after decades. Memories flood back. Some doors were never meant to close.

title: Pariyerum Perumal
plot: A dreamer enters halls of justice but finds invisible walls everywhere. His four-legged friend sees no barriers.

title: Soorarai Pottru
plot: They said the sky belongs to the rich. One man decided to prove them wrong with wings for the common.

title: Vikram Vedha
plot: A cop hunts a gangster. The gangster tells stories. Each tale blurs the line between hunter and hunted.

title: Asuran
plot: When the powerful take everything, a peaceful man must become what he once was to protect what remains.

title: Karnan
plot: A village fights for dignity. Their weapon: a sword that cuts through generations of oppression.

title: Visaranai
plot: Four lives shatter in an interrogation room. Truth becomes irrelevant when power demands confession.

title: Super Deluxe
plot: Four stories. One night. Reality bends when a visitor from the past meets seekers of forbidden truths.

title: Vada Chennai
plot: Decades of blood and brotherhood in northern streets. A reluctant warrior rises through chaos he never chose.

title: Kaala
plot: When developers want land, an aging guardian stands firm. This is his domain, painted in defiant colors.

title: Kabali
plot: An old warrior emerges from shadows to reclaim what was taken. His past and present collide in foreign lands.

title: Anbe Sivam
plot: Two strangers journey together. One sees divinity in humanity. The other learns that love transcends belief.

title: Nayakan
plot: From streets to empire. A boy becomes a godfather, ruling with iron fist and golden heart.

title: Thevar Magan
plot: A city man returns to village roots. Ancient codes of honor demand choices between blood and justice.

title: Mouna Ragam
plot: She loves another. He's her husband. Can arranged bonds transform into chosen devotion?

title: Roja
plot: Newlyweds torn apart by borders and bullets. A woman's love becomes her weapon against terror.

title: Bombay
plot: Two hearts, two faiths, one love. When the city burns, their union faces the ultimate test.

title: Kannathil Muthamittal
plot: A child learns her mother is not her mother. A journey begins to find the woman who gave her life.

title: Iruvar
plot: Two friends rise in cinema and politics. Ambition, betrayal, and power rewrite their brotherhood.

title: Thalapathi
plot: Abandoned at birth, raised by the streets. Loyalty to a friend conflicts with blood he never knew.

title: Naan Kadavul
plot: A blind beggar-singer. A girl enslaved by beggars. He becomes death's messenger for those who suffer.

title: Pithamagan
plot: A gravedigger knows only death. A small-time thief teaches him life. Friendship blooms in darkness.

title: Sethu
plot: Love transforms a carefree soul into a broken mind. Madness and devotion dance on a razor's edge.

title: Kadhal
plot: Class divides lovers. Families wage war. Young hearts refuse to surrender to ancient prejudices.

title: Kaadhal Kondein
plot: Obsession masquerades as love. A disturbed mind cages the object of his twisted affection.

title: Pudhupettai
plot: Born in slums, baptized in blood. A boy's journey through the underworld's darkest corridors.

title: 7G Rainbow Colony
plot: A reckless youth falls for his neighbor. Love blooms in cramped quarters but reality has other plans.

title: Subramaniapuram
plot: 1980s. Small town. Friends drift into crime. Loyalty and betrayal written in blood on dusty streets.

title: Nadodigal
plot: Friendship's ultimate test: helping a friend elope. But every action has consequences in close-knit villages.

title: Vennila Kabadi Kuzhu
plot: Village sport becomes battleground for pride, love, and redemption. Underdogs fight for respect.

title: Mynaa
plot: Young love in rural lands. Elopement leads to a desperate flight through forests and fate.

title: Kumki
plot: A mahout and his elephant enter the forest to protect villagers. He finds love and danger in equal measure.

title: Vaagai Sooda Vaa
plot: A teacher arrives in a remote village. He fights poverty and apathy to light the lamp of education.

title: Kalavani
plot: A village Romeo pursues his Juliet with schemes and songs. Rural romance painted with earthy humor.

title: Madras
plot: North vs South. A wall divides territories. Politics, pride, and a rooster ignite explosive tensions.

title: Jigarthanda
plot: A filmmaker seeks a gangster's story. The hunter becomes the hunted in a deadly game of art and violence.

title: Pizza
plot: A delivery boy enters a haunted house. Reality and horror blur in a night of supernatural terror.

title: Soodhu Kavvum
plot: Misfit kidnappers bungle their way through crime. Dark comedy meets fate's twisted sense of humor.

title: Maanagaram
plot: Three lives intersect in the urban jungle. One night in the city tests survival instincts and morality.

title: Thani Oruvan
plot: A brilliant officer hunts an equally brilliant villain. Chess match between genius minds with society as stakes.

title: Ratsasan
plot: A failed filmmaker becomes a cop. He hunts a serial killer targeting schoolgirls in a race against time.

title: Dhuruvangal Pathinaaru
plot: A wheelchair-bound cop recounts his most haunting case. Every clue leads to darker revelations.

title: Maanadu
plot: Time loops trap a man in a day of political assassination. He must break the cycle to save thousands.

title: Master
plot: An alcoholic professor sent to juvenile school. He faces a gangster who grooms children for crime.

title: Vikram
plot: A black-ops agent, a cop, and a drug lord. Their paths collide in a deadly game of masks and missions.

title: Leo
plot: A cafe owner's past catches up when violence erupts. Is he the peaceful man he claims or someone else?

title: Ponniyin Selvan I
plot: Kingdoms clash. Conspiracies brew. A young prince's destiny intertwines with an empire's fate.

title: Ponniyin Selvan II
plot: The crown's fate hangs in balance. Loyalties tested. Ancient prophecies meet political machinations.

title: Enthiran
plot: A scientist creates a robot. It develops emotions. Love and jealousy lead to technological apocalypse.
Phones become weapons. Birds attack. A scientist and his creation must stop a vengeful force of nature.

title: Indian
plot: A freedom fighter becomes vigilante against corruption. His own son becomes his enemy in the system.

title: Anniyan
plot: Multiple personalities. One seeks justice through brutal vigilantism. A lawyer's mind fractures into three.

title: Sivaji
plot: A man returns with wealth to help the poor. The corrupt system declares war on his noble intentions.

title: I
plot: A bodybuilder transformed into a monster seeks revenge on those who destroyed his life and love.

title: Thuppakki
plot: An army officer on vacation discovers a sleeper cell. He must stop terror attacks while maintaining cover.

title: Kaththi
plot: A thief impersonates a revolutionary. He inherits a fight against corporate greed stealing farmers' lands.

title: Sarkar
plot: A CEO enters politics to fight corruption. The system fights back with every weapon in its arsenal.

title: Ghajini
plot: Memory lasts 15 minutes. Revenge drives a man with amnesia to hunt his lover's killer through photographs.

title: Vaaranam Aayiram
plot: A son learns his father's story of love and loss. Two generations, parallel journeys of the heart.

title: Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa
plot: A Hindu boy loves a Christian girl. Families oppose. Dreams of cinema mirror impossible romance.

title: Yennai Arindhaal
plot: A cop's past refuses to stay buried. Protecting his family means confronting the ghosts he tried to escape.
